critique: The document expresses concern for children in foster care and aims to improve the child welfare system. It highlights the challenges faced by children in foster care, such as waiting for adoption, aging out of the system, and experiencing homelessness. The document also outlines steps to address these challenges, such as encouraging partnerships between state agencies and community organizations, improving access to resources for caregivers and youth, and ensuring equality of treatment for all families. The document conveys a sense of sadness and concern for the children in foster care, as well as a sense of hope and determination to improve the system. It also expresses a sense of disgust at the unacceptable outcomes faced by young people who age out of foster care.
